level.text: Where counsel is filing a pleading in consolidated cases, a single filing in the lead case is deemed to be filed in all cases consolidated with it.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 2078 (March 8, 2002); as amended by Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 4782 (May 20, 2005) [EXPIRED].
